Title: Azure Mortgage Service
Description: Azure Mortgage Service is a WCF-based service that calculate mortgage schedules that is cloud-hostable in Azure. It includes a WPF-based client to test the service and view the mortgage schedules the service produces.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Azure Mortgage Service is a WCF-based service that calculate mortgage schedules that is cloud-hostable in Azure. It includes a WPF-based client to test the service and view the mortgage schedules the service produces.



A community donation of Neudesic.
